descriptionHtml:
[size=5][u]ABOUT[/u][/size]
[size=3]
Ever wanted to summon a Corrupted Shade in Skyrim? Now you can![/size]

Conjure up to two (with Twin Souls perk) powerful Corrupted Shade Mages!

Duration: 
Magicka Cost to Cast: 100

CONJURED CORRUPTED SHADE STATS:

Spells:
Conjure Skeletons (Conjures 2 skeletons)
Frostbite
Icy Spear
Icy Spike

Equipment:
-

Stats:
Health: 250
Magicka: 500
Stamina: 60


[u][size=5]Version History[/size]

[/u]Current Version: 1.0

1.0: 
+AI Fixes
+Removed some spells and a shout
+Changed look
+Added spells


1.0b: BETA


[size=5][u]Suggest some![/u]

[/size]I will strictly be doing only Conjuration spells, I'm always looking for new ideas! Leave any suggestion of a conjuration spell that you would like to be added!
author: Vamure
